field.label: Reverse Proxy Domain
field.help: Enter a domain name or IP address. For a wildcard domain, use *.example.com. Only use wildcard domains with a wildcard certificate. Don't forget to create a firewall rule that allows port 80 and 443 to "This Firewall".

field.label: Reverse Proxy Port
field.help: Enter the port number. Leave this empty for bind to port 80 and 443 with automatic redirection. Don't forget to create a firewall rule that allows this port to "This Firewall".

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this reverse proxy domain.

field.label: DNS-01 challenge
field.help: Enable DNS-01 challenge for ACME, please configure DNS Provider and API Key in General Settings. In most cases, leaving this option unchecked will be the best choice. The automatic Let's Encrypt HTTP challenge will be used if this option is unchecked, which needs no further configuration.

field.label: Custom Certificate
field.help: Choose your own certificate from System Trust Certificates. Make sure you have imported the full chain. In most cases, leaving this on "None" will be the best choice.
